```
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: random-generator
spec:
  minReplicas: 1               ![1](assets/1.png)
  maxReplicas: 5               ![2](assets/2.png)
  scaleTargetRef:              ![3](assets/3.png)
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: random-generator
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 50 ![4](assets/4.png)
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
```

```
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
...
spec:
  ...
  behavior:
    scaleDown:                        ![1](assets/1.png)
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 300 ![2](assets/2.png)
      policies:
      - type: Percent                 ![3](assets/3.png)
        value: 10
        periodSeconds: 60

    scaleUp:                          ![4](assets/4.png)
      policies:
      - type: Pods                    ![5](assets/5.png)
        value: 4
        periodSeconds: 15
```

```
apiVersion: serving.knative.dev/v1         ![1](assets/1.png)
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: random
  annotations:
    autoscaling.knative.dev/target: "80"   ![2](assets/2.png)
    autoscaling.knative.dev/window: "120s"
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8spatterns/random          ![3](assets/3.png)
```

```
apiVersion: keda.sh/v1alpha1
kind: ScaledObject
metadata:
  name: kafka-scaledobject
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    name: kafka-consumer                           ![1](assets/1.png)
  pollingInterval: 30                              ![2](assets/2.png)
  triggers:
    - type: kafka                                  ![3](assets/3.png)
      metadata:
        bootstrapServers: bootstrap.kafka.svc:9092 ![4](assets/4.png)
        consumerGroup: my-group
        topic: my-topic
```

```
apiVersion: autoscaling.k8s.io/v1
kind: VerticalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: random-generator-vpa
spec:
  targetRef:            ![1](assets/1.png)
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: random-generator
  updatePolicy:
    updateMode: "Off"   ![2](assets/2.png)
```
